headline: INFICON RESIDUAL GAS ANALYZER SYSTEM
description: Residual Gas Analyzer System    Inficon Transpector CIS
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Vacuum Process Instrumentation
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Process Instrumentation > Residual Gas Analyzers
specstable:
Manufacturer Inficon
Model Transpector CIS
Description Residual Gas Analyzer
Mass Range 200 AMU
Accessories
  • CIS TS200
  • CIS Controller Part number 90B-140-G1
  • Leybold 151 Turbo pump with NT 150/360 controller
  • IG3 Vacuum Gauge Controller
  • 4 Position Manual Sample Valve
  • Leybold D1.6B
Other Information

Mass Range: 200 AMU
RS232 and RS485
TWare32 software p/n 911-339-G3, will work with Windows XP
As of 2015 Inficon is not supporting Tware32 and giving software for free
Foreline pump is not included

Power Requirements 110 V 15.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 39.000 in (99.1 cm)
Depth 22.000 in (55.9 cm)
Height 62.000 in (157.5 cm)
Weight 334 lb (152 kg)
